comments.author: Oleg Kalnichevski
comments.body:
Damn maven! My bad. 

Fixed execute permissions on the cgi script. The download page should be functional again in 15 to 30 min.

Oleg

description: maybe you know this, but http://hc.apache.org/downloads.cgi (the downloads for httpcomponents and for httpclient) is broken (500 internal server error)...
